parameters.name: DbType
parameters.description: The type of the database. For more information about the valid values of this parameter, see [DbType parameter](~~198106~~).

parameters.name: EnvType
parameters.description: The environment type of the database. For more information, see [Change the environment type of an instance](~~163309~~).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to search for databases.

parameters.name: SearchRange
parameters.description:
The query range based on permissions. Valid values:

*   **HAS_PERMSSION**: searches for databases on which the current user has permissions.
*   **OWNER**: searches for databases owned by the current user.
*   **MY_FOCUS**: searches for databases that the current user follows.
*   **UNKNOWN**: searches for all databases.

parameters.name: SearchTarget
parameters.description:
The category of the database. Valid values:

*   **DB**: single database or logical database.
*   **SINGLE_DB**: single database.
*   **LOGIC_DB**: logical database.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to query the tenant ID.
